Name: Lepidolite K(Li,Al)3(Si,Al)_4O_10(F,OH)_2
Type: Mineral
Class: Silicates
Subclass: Phyllosilicates
Particle Size: 0-45um
Sample No.: PS-13A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VNIR-SWIR
Origin: USA, South Dakota
Collected by Ward's
Description:  Yellow lepidolite. 





Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units:  Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:  Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:   0.40
Last X Value:   2.50
Number of X Values:  826
Additional Information: ps13aa.txt
